title: 07/06/21 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 07/06/21 DPS Best of
description:
Jason McIntyre and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, are gearing up for Game 1 of the NBA Finals and while LaVar is excited to see some new blood, Jason questions the legitimacy of the Suns who got through injury riddled teams. They see both sides of the Rachel Nichols-Maria Taylor story and pump the brakes on cancel culture coming for Rachel Nichols. They’re excited to see student athletes afforded the ability to profit off their Name, Image and Likeness, but LaVar sees big pitfalls in how dollar signs can ruin families and the spirit of education.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
